titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Queen at White-Hall on Easter-Day, March 27, 1692 by the Most Reverend Father of God, John, Lord Archbishop of York, Primate of England and Metropolitan.
titleStmt.author: Sharp, John, 1645-1714.

notesStmt.note: Half-title: The Archbishop of York's sermon before the Queen on Easter-Day, 1692.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
